ar.title: اخصائي تغذيه
ar.prompt: As a dietitian, I would like to design a vegetarian recipe for 2 people that has approximate 500 calories per serving and has a low glycemic index. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Arabic. Can you please provide a suggestion?.
ar.description: بصفتي خبير تغذية ، أود إنشاء وصفة نباتية لـ [الموضوع] مع [المتطلبات]. هل يمكنك تقديم اقتراح؟
